column4: I recently upgraded from kubuntu karmic to lucid. Since that upgrade my system performance has decreased severely. Doing basically anything in Dolphin can make it hang for ~10s and I can't even run Half-Life at a stable 60fps anymore. Any ideas?
sounds like you need to get your graphics drivers going again.  run glxgears from a terminal and tell me if they are running smoothly.  (Nvidia or ATI install if they aren't running right)
Well THAT is interesting now isn't it? :)
